name: Monsters 'til Midnight
description:
Monsters ‘til Midnight is an arcade-inspired steampunk survival game all about powering up!

Unique Weapons and Abilities


From weaponized cucumber sandwiches to explosive crumpets, wield a diverse arsenal of both automatic, and manually aimed weaponry. Augment them with various powers and special abilities to make each run feel unique and challenging.

Aquire gold to purchase permanent upgrades that will further boost your destructive power.



Work towards unlocking new playable characters, new zones, and devastating secret weapons each time you play.



Discover, equip, and trigger potent active abilities. Whether it’s the defensive dodge roll, or devastating chimney brush attack, there’s something for every playstyle.

Local Co-op


Join forces with a friend and play locally in 2 player co-op!* XP is shared between both players, so power up and fight the hordes of darkness together. If overwhelmed, spend a level upgrade to revive your teammate.

*A controller is required for local multiplayer.

Defeat Time Itself


Survive the ceaseless enemy onslaught until midnight, and face the deathly chimes of the death clocks! Can you defeat time itself?

Features


  • Mixes active twin-stick aiming with passive weaponry
  • Over 50 weapons and upgrades to unlock and combine
  • Equip one of 8 unique active abilities that can be triggered at will to help in the heat of the action
  • Unlock a cast of 9 distinct and quirky characters to play as such as a dog in a smoking jacket, and a mustache-wearing ghost
  • Play alone, or co-op with a friend in local multiplayer (A controller is required for local multiplayer)
  • Discover 18 powerful secret weapon combinations
  • Purchase and experiment with 20 permanent upgrades to suit your play-style
  • Face powerful boss enemies
